Address.Address1: TORRES-ALBANCHES DE MAGINA (ERAS DE AZMORATIN) KM. 2.8

Description.Text: General Information:Surrounded by the highest tips of the province of Jaén, between pines and olive trees it is located upon a hill that rises on an ample valley and offers in any season superb views that are opened until fertile valleys of Úbeda and Baeza.Location:The hotel Puerto Mágina is in a privileged place, to single 3 km of the locality Towers, that still its provincial life with all its values conserves.Area Details: Located to 33 km of Jaén and 50 km of Úbeda and Baeza in this town the time still stopped, reason why it conserves still his annual rate, dictated by the nature and agriculture, so his calm life. One is nailed in Sierra Mágina, from which innumerable sources arise that provide a great amount of water, that specially makes possible a spectacular landscape - during the flowering of the cherry trees in the month of March. It exists all a culture around the care and culture of these trees, being the harvesting of the fruit a true celebration. Establishment from the antiquity prehistoric paintings in the Cave of the Morrón are conserved, that are oldest of the region. The Parochial Church conserves a gothic baptismal battery and the image of the Christ Crucificado, whose celebration is celebrated the Sunday next to the 20 of May and receives the popular name of Celebration of the Christ of the Day laborers.Recreation:The landscapes of dream and the tranquility of the surroundings assure to any traveler their rest and total relaxation. The kitchen is based on the prescriptions of all the life, that give back memories to the childhood and which nowadays they are more and more difficult to find or to prepare in house by the accelerated rate of the modern life.Rooms:The rooms and apartments with their glad and cozy decoration emphasize by their amplitude and the space defines all the set with terraces and placetas to coexist and to integrate itself to the great family that forms the employees and the guests.

Surrounded by the highest tips of the province of Jaén, between pines and olive trees it is located upon a hill that rises on an ample valley and offers in any season superb views that are opened until fertile valleys of Úbeda and Baeza.
